CustomField.description: Days that passed since the first trial ship to the account and the day its devices were claimed. It only take into account trials shipped before any purchase.
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT( ISBLANK(First_Purchase_Date__c) ) ,
IF( AND(First_Purchase_Date__c-First_Trial_Ship_Date__c>=0, First_Purchase_Date__c-DATEVALUE(Free_Trial_First_Device_Claim_Datetime__c)>=0),
IF(DATEVALUE(Free_Trial_First_Device_Claim_Datetime__c)-First_Trial_Ship_Date__c>=0,
DATEVALUE(Free_Trial_First_Device_Claim_Datetime__c)-First_Trial_Ship_Date__c,
NULL),
NULL),
IF(DATEVALUE(Free_Trial_First_Device_Claim_Datetime__c)-First_Trial_Ship_Date__c>=0,
DATEVALUE(Free_Trial_First_Device_Claim_Datetime__c)-First_Trial_Ship_Date__c,
NULL))
CustomField.label: Days From Trial Ship To Activation
